description.en: Kryptokrona exists to secure and simplify our future economic system. Sending and receiving money should not be expensive or slow. We work with open source code that allows you to be involved and improve the money of the future.

status_updates.description: We've reached block 800,000 ðŸŽ‰ All service providers needs to update their mixin to "3" as it's currently the only allowed value. Next stop 1m blocks ðŸ¤©

Altilly update

Altilly has been able to recover the Kryptokrona wallets, and we've been discussing how to move forward. We looked at options to be able to give back coins to the rightful owners. But due to all the variables, this is hard, if not impossible, without all the accounts data. Therefore, we will assist Altilly on this endeavor in every way we can. We keep our fingers crossed that a solution will find its way.

For more information visit:
https://altilly.com/

Merry Christmas!

Now you can create a perfect Christmas present with kryptokrona and give to your loved ones during the Christmas celebrations.

http://kryptokrona.se/xkrmas/
You can now track your hodlings at Blockfolio and we've now applied for Blockfolio Signal.
We're now on beam! Stay tuned for updates!
